= SeqDiag
include::partial$uris.adoc[]

{uri-seqdiag}[SeqDiag] seqdiag generates sequence-diagram images from .diag files (similar to graphvizâ€™s DOT files).

== Supported Image Formats

- PDF
- PNG (default)
- SVG

== Attributes

[cols=">,<,<",options="header"]
|===
|Name         |Default value   |Description
|seqdiag      |seqdiag         |The path to the `seqdiag` binary
|===
